channel.title: Help! @@ Thanks ^.^
channel.description: Hey... I just recently made a MoparScape Server. But I have a few questions... How do I play around with stats? As in how do I change my own. Thanks to anyone that answers this. And if you need a screenie just post in this forum. Thanks in Advance.

item.title: Help! @@ Thanks ^.^
item.dc:creator: @liljon liljon
item.description:
@liljon wrote:

Step 1: Open your source folder.
Step 2: Find Characters folder.
Step 3: Find your username.
Step 4: Change playerrights to 3.
Step 5: For Character skills put for level 1-135 for xp 1-500000000+!

Hope this helps!

Read full topic
